name: leisure
description:
The leisure command extracts leisure and recreation features from OSM data. Categories include:

- Parks: parks, gardens, nature reserves, dog parks
- Sports: pitches, sports centres, stadiums, golf courses, pools
- Recreation: playgrounds, fitness stations, water parks
- Culture: marinas, bandstands, dance venues

Calculates area for polygonal features.

options.-t, --type: Filter by leisure type (e.g., park, playground)
options.-c, --category: Filter by category: parks, sports, recreation, culture
options.-f, --format: Output format: geojson, json, csv (default: geojson)

output:
Leisure features with:
- leisure: Feature type
- name: Place name
- sport: Sport type(s) for sports facilities
- area_sqm: Area in square meters (for polygons)
- Geometry: Point or Polygon
